bioconda.name: promod3
bioconda.summary: ProMod3 is a tool for protein structure prediction and refinement

biotools.summary:
ProMod3 is a versatile homology modelling toolbox.

ProMod3 is a modelling engine based on the OpenStructure [biasini2013] computational structural biology framework that can perform all steps required to generate a protein model by homology. Its modular design aims at implementing flexible modelling pipelines and fast prototyping of novel algorithms.
